Expected Results: Game should not crash when pressing r
Edge of ball sprite should not pass through terrain line

Cannot rotate about grapple point if length of grapple is too long causing player to hit ground
Steps to Reproduce: Attach to grapple point at a distance

Ball rotation speed when de-accelerating doesn't match up nicely with actual ball velocity.
Expected Results: ball angular momentum should slow down and speed up at same rate as ball velocity
Actual Results: ball spins too fast despite almost being at a standstill
Steps to Reproduce: roll in one direction on ground and then hold down the opposite movement key to de-accelerate.

Expected Results: The ball should not phase through the ramp
Actual Results: The ball phases through the ramp
Steps to Reproduce: Try to go up the ramp in different speeds

Expected Results: The grapple can sometimes lag behind the ball visually
Actual Results: The grapple should not lag behind the ball
Steps to Reproduce: Go fast around a grapple point

Grapple attachment zone is not perfectly centered
Expected Results: Grapple attachment zone should be centered
Actual Results: Grapple attachment feels offset to the right
Steps to Reproduce: Try to click to attach to grapple in left/right regions relative to the grapple point

Expected Results: All ramps should have perfect collision behavior
Actual Results: Some ramps in the tutorial cause the player to become stuck
Steps to Reproduce: Try the ramps in the tutorial level

Game crashes randomly when on the grapple
Expected Results: Game should never crash when grappling
Steps to Reproduce: Attempt to use the grapple enough times and you may encounter this bug
